name: Ludare OS - Triple Dare Edition
description:
Keyboard Controls: 
  • A Button -> X Key
  • B Button -> Z Key
  • START -> ENTER
  • SELECT -> SHIFT
  • DPAD -> ARROW KEYS
Description:

I originally made this game in 2 days for the Ludum Dare 50 Compo (game jam if you're unfamiliar).  I basically took what I finished for that and gave myself 4 more days (hence the "Triple Dare" edition) to see what I could add to it.  The theme for the Game Jam was "delay the inevitable" so that was incorporated into the game in a few different ways.

This version is basically a puzzle game...hidden within a math game...hidden within a short point and click narrative.

This can also be played on original Game Boy and Game Boy Color hardware as well as the Analogue Pocket:

Game Boy ROM Zip

POCKET File
